Products

See What We Have Been Working On!.

Powerful Algorithm

Cutting edge algoritms using advanced industry and academic research in motor control gives you all the torque with none of the inefficency.

Impressive Battery Performance

A 5 hour Battery performance is maximized by both expert hardware design and PCB layout practices as well as plenty of extra behind-the-scenes feedback so that the system knows just how to handle the battery in any condition.

Light, Foldable & Compact

There when you need it, and out of the way when you don't! The compact and modular design allows for easy attachment/detatchment from the kayak. At less than 15lbs, this is the lightest and most powerful kayak drive system ever.

Many Advanced Features

Kayaking isn't just about going in a straight line as fast as possible (although, we can do that!). We also bake in a plethora of other features, including Virtual AnchorÂ©, Trip Replay, Emergency Broadcast and more!

About

Who Are You Guys, Anyway?

  • 2010

    Our Humble Beginnings

    We started our careers as classmates and became business partners. After one of our wives got caught in an outgoing tide on a kayk, we felt that there had to be a better solution in case kayakers got stuck in a similar situation. Beyond safety, we wanted our design to be modular, light, easy to use and it had to fit on any kayak in the market.

  • 2013

    An Agency is Born

    BubblesTech was initally founded as a consulting firm to help companies who needed surge resources to finish out project that were in some sort of trouble. We were never called in because things were going super well, but rather, because they were in tough shape! Becasue of this, we have a deep bench of knowledge when it comes to electronics and product design!

  • 2019

    Beta Testing

    After years of working in the NPI industry and in parallel developing the Hydra Kayak System, we are please to be in Beta testing and look forward to the wonderful feedback from our Beta Testers around the world!

  • 2020

    Phase Two Expansion

    We have an anticipated date of Spring 2020 to release the Hydra Kayak control system to our partners after integrating feedback from Beta testers. At that time, we are anticipating having all updated design packages to our CMs and ready to go.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Project Name

Electronics.

Our state of the art electronics deliver power and safety to you unlike any other motorized kayak propulsion system on the market today.

  • Category: Electronics

Compatability

Compatability.

Our system is designed to ~90% of kayaks that exist in the market today. This means that the old kayak in your garage can get new life within minutes and be back on the water again! You donât need any specialized kayak designs with holes cut in the deck or a highly specific style of kayak in order to make it fit. It probably already fits out of the box!

  • Category: Compatability

Use Cases

How can the Hydra Help You?

With the Hydra system, you can use the system when you need it for going fast with the push of a joystick, autopiloting to your favorite spot on the water and as a paddle assist when needed. When you donât want they thrusters in your way, the whole unit folds up like a suitcase and gets out of your way. This allows you to shoot rapids without fear of damaging the system, or it makes it easy to get back to fishing once you are where you want to be without having to worry about getting tangled in a lower-unit like other permanent propulsion systems.

Itâs there when you need it, and itâs out of the way when you donât!

  • Category: Use Case

Mechanical Design

Mechanical Design.

Our Mechanical Engineering design team is the best in class. With years of design experience with dynamic solid structures and material deisgn, the Hydra clocks in at less than 15lbs with itâs 5 1/2 hour battery installed! The structural material will stand up to the tough conditions of marine environments including salt water and lake/river environments without breaking your back!

Itâs modular design allows you to easily remove batteries for charging after a long day and itâs folding armature structure takes only a second to engage or disengage from the water to get you moving or fishing in no time at all!

  • Category: Mechanical Design

Safety

Safety

The sinking feeling of falling out of a Kayak in rough waters or even in seemingly calm waters is a major concern for kayakers safety.

The Hydra system features a number of safety features that make the unit itself safe and also make the kayak itself safe in the event of an accident.

Itâs IP67 rating and waterproof design means that the unit is safe for the water in case of a tip over event, and itâs safety interlocks means that if you fall out of the craft, itâs advanced GPS hold features will actively keep the kayak in place instead of drifting away when things go wrong.

  • Category: Safety

Battery Life

Battery Life

The Hydra features a totally modular, custom designed LiPo battery to provide the torque, power and battery life you want! At crusing speeds, a 5 1/2 hour battery life is a minimum specification that we set out to achieve and succeeded.

The battery is completely removable and swappable by the user either on or off the water (Get two in case the fish arenât biting for most of the afternoon!).

The battery itself is ~7lbs which is 1/5th the weight of a conventional marine battery that doesnât come close to the useable life that our Hydra power cell battery system is able to provide.

Fully waterproof with numerous safety interlocks, our Hydra battery system will keep you safe and keep you moving for hours!

  • Category: Battery Life
